info.title: 10 safety rules. What can and cannot be done on the Internet
info.short_text: The World Wide Web gives humankind unprecedented opportunities. But the more the services provide us with the Internet, the more cautious we have to show when we use them.

info.title: New Year's miracle. How the New Year's billion changed the lives of winners
info.short_text: A few days remain until the new year, which means that very soon, 1 January 2024, there will be the longest-lived Risko Loto circulation - New Year billion.

info.title: All royalties have been known since 1 January 2024
info.short_text: All non-employed retirees are indexed to pensions, which will increase the payments by 7.5 per cent.

info.title: In Kyiv, a man was charged with attempting to hijack a Russian military aircraft
info.short_text: Roman Chervinsky, as a taxman, promised the businessman $100,000 to help bring back a cigarette ship arrested in Odes Customs.

info.title: Users complained about the Telegram Messenger malfunctions.
info.short_text: Messenger users have problems sending messages.

info.title: Plans 2024. Lixutov told me what we're going to do in the future.
info.short_text: The development of the subway and the IDC, the prospects for launching new routes of electricity and unmanned trams, at a press conference following the work of the Transport Complex in 2023, the Deputy Moskva Maxim Lixutov spoke about major changes.

info.title: The residents of the Astrakhan region were prohibited by the self-defense of domestic dogs
info.short_text: Large dogs are prohibited for children up to 14 years without adult escort.

info.title: Been stabbed in the back. Ukrainian Kiborg was sentenced for 16 years
info.short_text: The sentence was handed down in absentia, and the offender was declared international.

info.title: SHOT: Over 26 kg of drugs were found in the trunk of a car on the M12 track
info.short_text: The driver was detained.

info.title: Misustin protested the guitar that was given to a 10-year-old girl from Permi.
info.short_text: The Head of Government of the Russian Federation has also fulfilled the dream of a 6-year-old boy from the Kostrom region.

info.title: In Ukraine, the issuance of driver ' s licences is tens of times since 1 January
info.short_text: The Ukrainian cabinet has issued an order to increase the price of the services of the Ministry of Internal Affairs for the issuance of driving permits and registration of transport.

info.title: Synoptic Tishkovec warned about the arrival of a real Russian winter in January
info.short_text: After a new year's night, the Japanese freezes will begin in Russia.

info.title: The NGTU is working on the creation of a new Arctic meteoplex
info.short_text: The project is being implemented within the framework of the scientific consortium of the Arctic Territories and North Sea Road Development.

info.title: Deputa Herson province of Sabinov went volunteering in the SVO area
info.short_text: The Sabinov will begin to carry out their tasks as soon as possible.

info.title: More than 1,000 Ukrainian oligarch sites were removed by the authorities of Crimea.
info.short_text: The republic owned objects of movable and immovable property, including 200 enterprises.

info.title: Sherlock Holmes of Lebanon told me what Mihalkov was doing on the survey site.
info.short_text: Michalkov and director Maslennikov were sometimes conflicted.

info.title: Russian cinema collections exceeded 40 billion roubles in 2023
info.short_text: Tatiana Golikova reported on the results of the Russian film industry in the coming year.

info.title: Miller denounced the increase in gas supplies to Central Asia
info.short_text: Gazprom will enter into contact for the supply of gas to Kyrgyzstan, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan.

info.title: In the Czech Republic, new year salutes are cancelled as a sorrow for the victims of the shooting in Prague.
info.short_text: The salute will not take place in Prague and the second largest population in the city of Brno.

info.title: It's a plus to minus. Vilfand promised anomalies early in January
info.short_text: In early January, temperatures in Moscow and Podmoskovier may fall to less than 20 degrees or more. And the new year's night of synoptics is described as " truly unexpected " . Aif.ru found out what's still to wait for the weather.
